index-page.title: Hey, I’m Alexander Konietzko
index-page.intro:
I'm a software developer, dual student, and creator. I work at 
the development team of Netgo. You've found my personal slice of the 
internet – have fun while you're here or learn more about me.
index-page.about-1:
Hey, I'm Alex. I'm $AGE years 
old and come from Germany. I live in NRW and spend my free time 
playing piano, do sports or enjoying time with friends and family.
index-page.about-2:
I started working with computers when I was young and started 
programming in school. After I graduated I began my dual study at 
Netgo GmbH where I work and Westfälische Hochschule where I study.
index-page.about-3:
I'm currently learning .NET Core and Angular but my favourite framework is 
NextJs. In the future I want to build my own Kubernetes cluster with 
backend services, database integration and a solid frontend combined 
by Nginx.

404.title: Page not found
404.description:
Why show a generic 404 when I can make it sound mysterious? It seems 
you've found something that used to exist, or you spelled 
something wrong. I'm guessing you spelled something wrong. Can 
you double check that URL?

blog.description: I've been writing online since 2022, mostly about web devlopment and random stuff. In total, I've written $AMOUNT articles on my blog. Use the search below to filter by title.

guestbook.title: Guestbook
guestbook.description: Leave a comment below. It could be anything – appreciation, information, wisdom, or even humor. Surprise me!

form.title: Sign the Guestbook
form.description: Share a message for a future visitor of my site.
form.info: Your information is only used to display your name and reply by email.

guestbook.success: Hooray! Thanks for signing my Guestbook.
